law.text: If, in the referendum called under the provisions of KRS 247.6901 to 247.6957, a majority of the eligible producers who vote in the referendum vote in the affirmative and in favor of levying and collecting the assessment proposed in the referendum, the assessment shall be collected in the manner determined and announced by the association conducting the referendum.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 12, effective July 14, 1992.
